text: Ceroplesis rugosopunctata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1925 and is known from Kenya.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis rugosopunctata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesini Category:Beetles described in 1925
title: Ceroplesis rugosopunctata
